message.body: Hey! I figured sammy and Jeff will be going to the restaurant together. do you know if Phuong was going to drive or if we were taking the train?
I'm not sure. Did you want to ask phuong? We haven't heard from anyone. But I also don't want to be late. I suppose we could take the train. But let me ask Sam what she's doing first I guess.
Okay. And then let me know and I'll ask Phuong.
So Jeff's picking Sam up. She didn't offer a ride so I said we'll meet them there. Want to ask phuong?
Phuong said she thinks she's going to be late. So I'm taking that as a no.
Ok. So we should leave around 6:20 for the train then.
Okay. I'll walk myself on over to you before then :)
